Store and retrieve objects from IBM Cloud Object Storage.

[id="extensions-ibm-cos-whats-inside"]
== What's inside

* xref:{cq-camel-components}::ibm-cos-component.adoc[IBM Cloud Object Storage component], URI syntax: `ibm-cos:bucketName`

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-ibm-cos</artifactId>
